item.title: PayScale buys MarketPay
item.dc:creator: Denise Reicher
item.description: Well this was very interesting, who would have predicted this? I haven’t used either, but have certainly seen the advertising … Read More
item.content:encoded:
Well this was very interesting, who would have predicted this? I haven’t used either, but have certainly seen the advertising and websites for both. Let’s hope compensation professionals gain from this merger.

PayScale purchases MarketPay
